name: reusable-canvas-preview
description: Reusable canvas library for creating interactive shapes

scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --tag patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --tag minor
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --tag major
scripts.release:beta: npm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:alpha: npm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && npm publish --tag alpha
